1.title: Why "Game of Thrones" Creators Will Make Great 'Star Wars' Movies
1.plot: Forget winter! A new spin on that galaxy far, far away is coming from the creative duo behind HBO's "Game of Thrones." D.B. Weiss and David Benioff have just been announced as the writers and producers of a series of Star Wars films.

2.title: Our Favorite Inspirational Speeches From Movie & TV Presidents
2.plot: Happy Presidents' Day! Celebrate the holiday with our favorite inspirational speeches from fictional movie and TV presidents.

3.title: Midseason Premiere: Are Two More Toast?
3.plot: Will two major characters meet their maker before Season 8 ends? Here's all the mind-blowing details you need to know before "The Walking Dead" returns for the second half of Season 8!

4.title: Through the Lens: Creating Worlds in the Films of Director Guillermo del Toro
4.plot: IMDb delves into the fantastical worlds and unique visual stylings of Oscar-nominated director Guillermo del Toro, including examples from 'The Shape of Water,' 'Hellboy,' 'Pan's Labyrinth,' 'Cronos,' 'The Devil's Backbone,' 'Blade 2,' 'Crimson Peak,' and 'Pacific Rim.'

5.title: Director's Trademarks: A Guide to the Films of Steven Spielberg
5.plot: IMDb takes a closer look at the trademarks of Steven Spielberg's directorial style, including shooting stars, striking silhouettes, reflective perspectives, tracking shots, and more.

6.title: Director's Trademarks: The Films of Wes Anderson
6.plot: IMDb takes a closer look at the trademarks of Wes Anderson's directorial style, including tracking shots, hand-placed objects, distinct color palettes, and more.

11.title: Cast & Crew Connections: "Lost in Space"
11.plot: Everyone in Hollywood may be six degrees from Kevin Bacon, but with IMDb you can connect anyone in Hollywood to everyone else. Find out how the cast and crew of "Lost in Space" connect to one another through other projects they have worked on.

12.title: Morgan's Journey from "Walking Dead" to "Fear" Explained in 88 Seconds
12.plot: We only have 88 seconds to do this, so we're going to make it quick! Morgan Jones (played by Lennie James) is leaving "The Walking Dead" after the Season 8 finale for a recurring role on "Fear the Walking Dead" for Season 4. But where it all begin for Morgan? Explainer88 has the lowdown.

13.title: 9 Things to Know About 'Incredibles 2'
13.plot: Learn more about how animators and creators developed and realized Pixar's latest movie, which follows Bob, Helen, Dash, Violet, and Jack Jack Parr right after the events of the original.

14.title: Choose Your Own "Westworld" Adventure
14.plot: We can't wait for "Westworld" to return to HBO for Season Two on Sunday, April 22, 2018, and in anticipation, we took to the streets to ask what YOU would want to do in "Westworld" for this Choose Your Own Adventure story.

15.title: Top 10 "Survivor" Tribal Council Votes of All Time
15.plot: The final words spoken by "Survivor" contestants when they cast their votes at tribal council are nothing short of entertaining. IMDb's votes are in, and the tribe has spoken. Here are the top 10 "Survivor" tribal council voting confessionals from the past 36 seasons.

16.title: 10 Athletes Who Won "Dancing With the Stars"
16.plot: The upcoming season of "Dancing With the Stars" will feature a cast of all athletes. Here are 10 sports stars who danced away with the Mirror Ball Trophy.

17.title: 'Bohemian Rhapsody' ... So Far: Fast Facts on the Queen Biopic
17.plot: In November 2018, Queen will rock the big screen. Here is what we know about Freddie Mercury biopic 'Bohemian Rhapsody' ... so far.

18.title: Top 12 Most Memorable TV Weddings
18.plot: In honor of the highly-anticipated Royal Wedding, IMDb is taking a trip down memory lane to look back at some of TV's most memorable weddings.

19.title: Celebrity Hidden Talents
19.plot: Ever wonder what celebrities get up to in their spare time? Check out hidden talents with Margot Robbie, Andrew Garfield, Jennifer Lawrence, Daniel Radcliffe, Justin Bieber, and more.

20.title: Top 10 NBA Players Turned Actors
20.plot: LeBron James, Michael Jordan, and Shaquille O'Neal are just a few NBA all stars who have jumped from the hardwood to Hollywood. In celebration of this month's NBA Finals, here's a look at the top 10 basketball players turned actors.

21.title: Celebrities Who've Starred on Broadway
21.plot: With the 2018 Tony Awards nearly upon us, it's time to take a look at stars who have hit the Broadway stage.

24.title: How Thanos Got Six Infinity Stones: All 20 Marvel Movies in 10 Minutes
24.plot: Spanning more than 10 years, 20 movies, and 45 hours, Marvel has taken us on a wild, intergalactic hunt for the Infinity Stones. Here's your guide to who had which Infinity Stone, when, and why.

25.title: 'Hellboy' ... So Far: Fast Facts About the 2019 Reboot
25.plot: In 2019, 'Hellboy' returns with a new look, a new cast, and a new director at the helm. Here's what we know about 'Hellboy' ... so far.

26.title: 'Super Mario Bros.' 25 Years Later: Why the Movie Is Nothing Like the Game
26.plot: 'Super Mario Bros.' was the very first live-action adaptation of a video game, ever, and 25 years later, IMDb looks back at what went wrong with the infamous flop.

27.title: Young "Lost in Space" Stars Are Glad They Made Mark Hamill Cry
27.plot: Maxwell Jenkins and Mina Sundwall talk about the instant success of Lost in Space (2018) and the impact they had on some important audience members when the series made its debut.

28.title: Remembering Burt Reynolds
28.plot: IMDb pays tribute to Burt Reynolds, the beloved star of such films as 'Smokey and the Bandit,' 'The Longest Yard,' 'Boogie Nights,' and more.

29.title: Henry Cavill Quits Superman
29.plot: Is Superman quitting the Justice League? Henry Cavill is reportedly leaving the role of Krypton's favorite son after Warner Bros. announced that they are not pursuing another standalone Superman film.

30.title: Cast Connections
30.plot: Before the astronauts blast off on Hulu's "The First," let's get to know Sean Penn, LisaGay Hamilton, Melissa George, and the whole crew from past projects on IMDb. This is Cast Connections.

31.title: 43 Hidden Ghosts You Missed in "The Haunting of Hill House"
31.plot: Do you think you caught every hidden ghost in "The Haunting of Hill House"? IMDb makes sure no spook can slip through the cracks.

32.title: 10 Burning Questions After Watching "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina"
32.plot: The first season of "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina" left us wondering. Here are 10 burning questions we'd like addressed the next time we visit Greendale.

33.title: 'Widows' Cast Connections
33.plot: At the Chicago premiere of 'Widows,' IMDb sat down with Viola Davis, Michelle Rodriguez, Cynthia Erivo, and co-writer Gillian Flynn to find some common-link co-stars in a round of Cast Connections.

34.title: By the Numbers: "The Walking Dead"
34.plot: Have you ever wondered exactly how many characters have died in "The Walking Dead" since the show started? Or how many zombie heads Michonne has cut off with her katana? Well we counted them and some other fun stats so you don't have to!

35.title: Shot for Shot: 'The Lion King' (2019) v 'The Lion King'
35.plot: Does the new teaser trailer for 'The Lion King' look familiar? Check out our side-by-side comparison with scenes from the original 'The Lion King.'

36.title: In Memoriam 2018
36.plot: IMDb presents a tribute to those entertainers who passed away in 2018.

37.title: Stunt Busted with Nathan Barnatt
37.plot: Comedian Nathan Barnatt is obsessed with stunts but completely untrained on how to perform them. Watch as he attempts to recreate a stunt from 'Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.'

40.title: 'Glass' Cast Connections
40.plot: Samuel L. Jackson, James McAvoy, and writer/director M. Night Shyamalan uncover and rediscover surprising connections in their past roles and films, including a "Dope Thanks" that one actor didn't even know he had been given.

1.title: The Bad Guys Show: Awesome Bond Villains
1.plot: Patrick Epino counts down his favorite Bond villains.

2.title: Breaking Down the Golden Globe Movie Drama Contenders
2.plot: IMDb awards host Ben Lyons breaks down the Golden Globe nominees for Best Motion Picture - Drama. Plus, learn fun trivia, box-office info and IMDb users ratings for these films.

3.title: Breaking Down the Golden Globe TV Drama Contender
3.plot: IMDb awards host Ben Lyons gives viewers the scoop on the Golden Globe nominees for Best TV Series - Drama. Learn interesting facts about your favorite shows and discover how IMDb users rate these nominated shows.

4.title: Golden Globes by the Numbers
4.plot: As the 73rd Golden Globe Awards approaches, we're taking a look at some interesting trivia by the numbers. Did you know that the length of the red carpet is equal to 6 and a half NBA basketball courts? Watch the video to find out more fun numerical facts about one of the most glamorous award shows of the year.

5.title: Top Ten Movies of 2015
5.plot: IMDb presents our list of the top 10 highest-rated English-language movies of the year. Watch to find out if your favorite movie made the cut and learn fun trivia about the top films.

6.title: In Memoriam 2015
6.plot: IMDb presents a tribute to those entertainers who passed away this year. From famed director Wes Craven to beloved "Star Trek" star Leonard Nimoy, we pay our respects. Rest in peace.

7.title: Top Ten TV Shows of 2015
7.plot: Presenting the 10 most popular TV series of the year among IMDb users. Relive some of their greatest moments and find out some behind-the-scenes trivia. Is your favorite on the list? Let us know in the comments below.

8.title: Top Ten TV Character Deaths of 2015
8.plot: When our favorite characters die, we take it pretty hard. We're pouring one out in honor of those who lost their fake lives this year. From Jon Snow's shocking stabbing, to Derek Shephard's dramatic departure, we will remember them all.

9.title: Oscars by the Numbers
9.plot: Who was the youngest-ever Best Director nominee? Learn this and more in our IMDb Original video, "Oscars by the Numbers."

10.title: Breaking Down the Oscars: Snubs and Surprises
10.plot: Before the ceremony starts, we take a look back at the performers and films that were left off the ballot and the surprise nominees who made the cut.

11.title: Breaking Down the Oscars: Best Actress Contenders
11.plot: IMDb awards host Ben Lyons breaks down the Oscar nominees in the Best Actress category, revealing information including trivia, box-office info, and user ratings.

12.title: Breaking Down the Oscars: Best Actor Contenders
12.plot: IMDb awards host Ben Lyons breaks down the Oscar nominees in the Best Actor category, revealing information including trivia, box-office info, and user ratings.

13.title: IMDb Picks
13.plot: Here are the movies and television series IMDb Editors are most excited to watch each month.

14.title: IMDb Birthdays
14.plot: Each week IMDb celebrates some of our favorite celebrity birthdays by looking back at iconic roles, box-office hits, early IMDb credits, and more.

15.title: 'X-Men' Trivia: 7 Things You Might Not Know
15.plot: Who almost played Nightcrawler? And how many times has Hugh Jackman appeared as Wolverine? Learn 7 fun facts about the 'X-Men' franchise that you may have not already known.

1.title: In Memoriam 2016
1.plot: IMDb presents a tribute to those entertainers who passed away this year.

2.title: Top Ten TV Shows of 2016
2.plot: Here are the television shows that were most consistently popular with IMDb users in 2016.

3.title: Top Ten TV Character Deaths of 2016
3.plot: 2016 will be remembered as the year of self-sacrifice. Numerous TV heroines and heroes died to save others. Others died tragically, the victims of a cruel fate. There were also a couple of villains who got what was coming to them. Here are IMDb's picks for the year's 10 most impactful TV deaths.

4.title: Top Ten Movies of 2016
4.plot: What were the top movies of 2016? Find out which movies were most consistently popular with IMDb users this past year.

5.title: 10 Questions About the 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi' Teaser Trailer
5.plot: We've watched the teaser trailer for 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi,' and we have questions. 10 of them, in fact.

6.title: 9 Things to Know About 'Cars 3'
6.plot: Gear up for the next chapter of Pixar's 'Cars' franchise with fun, behind-the-scenes facts. Learn more about what's in store for Lightning McQueen.

7.title: Shot for Shot: 'Blade Runner 2049' v 'Blade Runner'
7.plot: Does the trailer for 'Blade Runner 2049' seem familiar? Well, it could be by design. Check out our side-by-side comparison of the movie's trailer with scenes from the original 'Blade Runner.'

8.title: 'Star Wars' Supercut: Parodies of the Trench Run
8.plot: To celebrate the 40th anniversary of 'Star Wars: A New Hope,' we've gathered together some memorable parodies of the trench-run scene. Buckle up as our favorite movie, TV, and online superfans take their aim at the Death Star.

9.title: 9 to Know: Pixar Scene Stealers
9.plot: From Rex ('Toy Story) and Dug ('Up') to Bing Bong ('Inside Out'), we salute the Pixar side characters who don't need a lot of screen time to make a huge impact. Spot any of your favorites?

10.title: 9 to Know: Kickass Women Superheroes
10.plot: We salute the wonder women who put the super in superhero.

11.title: So '90s It Hurts: 'Con Air'
11.plot: On the 20th anniversary of the release of 'Con Air,' we look back at the 1990s tropes and hallmarks of this classic action movie. Don't worry: there's plenty of Nicolas Cage to go around.

12.title: Universal Adds Monsters to the Mash
12.plot: Get all you need to know about the Dark Universe, Universal's franchise of rebooted classic horror characters that include the Mummy, Frankenstein, the Wolf Man, the Phantom of the Opera, the Hunchback of Notre Dame, and more.

13.title: Remembering Adam West
13.plot: Remembering America's favorite Batman, Adam West (1928 to 2017)

14.title: Everybody Dance Now: Dancing in Movies and TV
14.plot: In anticipation of the new season of "So You Think You Can Dance," we've cut together some memorable dance scenes from movies and television. Did your favorite dance scenes make the cut?

15.title: IMDb's ABCs of the DCEU
15.plot: With 'Wonder Woman' still kicking butt at the box office, we all want to know what's next for the DC Extended Universe. Here are the ABCs of everything DC.

16.title: So '90s It Hurts: 'Batman & Robin'
16.plot: On the 20th anniversary of the release of 'Batman & Robin,' we look back at the 1990s tropes and hallmarks of this unforgettable superhero movie. Don't worry: We have as many Mr. Freeze puns as we could fit!

17.title: 9 Things to Know About 'Transformers: The Last Knight'
17.plot: Get ready for 'Transformers: The Last Knight' with some fast facts about the movie and characters, including which robot in disguise might not make it to the end.

18.title: IMDb's ABCs of the Spiderverse
18.plot: Carnage, Venom, Black Cat, and Silver Sable are all making appearances in Sony's Spider-Man Universe, but will the titular arachnid be joining them? Here are the ABCs of everything Spider-Man.

19.title: Director's Trademarks: A Guide to the Films of Luc Besson
19.plot: From his breathtaking visuals to his comic-book influences, take a closer look at the trademarks of Luc Besson's directorial style.

21.title: IMDb's ABCs of the Marvel Cinematic Universe
21.plot: On Aug. 1, Disney announced that production had begun on 'Ant-Man and the Wasp' for release on July 6, 2018. The Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Douglas, and Michelle Pfeiffer picture falls into the latter half of Phase Three of the ever-growing Marvel Cinematic Universe. And before another comic book movie hits the big screen, let's break it all down in IMDb's ABCs of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

22.title: Evangeline Lilly, "Game of Thrones," and What's Trending Today on IMDb
22.plot: Here is what's trending on IMDb for Thursday, Aug. 3, 2017, including the Top 3 titles and names, and a look ahead at the movies opening this weekend.

23.title: Hack, Stars, and Surprises: Why "Game of Thrones" Trends #1 Every Week
23.plot: Here is what's trending for Thursday, Aug. 10, 2017. "Game of Thrones" has been at the top of our charts for weeks on end, so today, let's look at why the sword-and-dragon epic has taken the world by storm.

24.title: 9 Things to Know About 'Coco'
24.plot: Learn more about how animators and creators developed and realized Pixar's latest movie, which follows the story of a music-loving boy who makes an unforgettable journey to the Land of the Dead.

25.title: So '90s It Hurts: 'Flatliners'
25.plot: In honor of the 2017 sequel, we look back at the tropes and hallmarks that made the original 1990 "Flatliners" so '90s it hurts! From Kevin Bacon's bouncy locks to the cutting edge of analog tech, "Flatliners" is chock-full of '90s goodness.

26.title: Best Larry David-isms From "Curb Your Enthusiasm"
26.plot: To celebrate the return of "Curb Your Enthusiasm," we've put together some pretty, pretty good Larry David quotes to make you laugh.

27.title: Director's Trademarks: A Guide to the Films of James Cameron
27.plot: From fierce female characters to groundbreaking visual FX, take a closer look at the trademarks of James Cameron's directorial style.

28.title: 5 Things We've Learned From "The Walking Dead" Season 8 Premiere
28.plot: We learned crucial tidbits during the Season 8 premiere of AMC's "The Walking Dead." Watch to find out what we discovered.

29.title: Kids on Bikes: Our Favorite Scenes
29.plot: Some of the most nostalgic moments in "Stranger Things" were the bike scenes, which captured the freedom, autonomy, and camaraderie of youth. In anticipation of the upcoming season premiere of "Stranger Things," here's a look a some of our favorite scenes of kids on bikes from movies and television.

30.title: 2017 Halloween Movies: The Movie
30.plot: Looking for something to watch this Halloween? IMDb breaks down what to expect from this year's horror films in our horror movie parody trailer.

31.title: 5 Things We Didn't Learn from "Stranger Things" Season 2
31.plot: After binge watching the second season of "Stranger Things," we run down some unresolved questions we'd like addressed next time we revisit Hawkins, Ind., in Season 3.

32.plot: See your favorite stars, including Beyonce as Nala and Donald Glover as Simba, side-by-side with the characters they'll be playing in the remake of this 1994 classic.

33.title: Shot for Shot: Movie Scenes That Inspired "Stranger Things" Season 2
33.plot: "Stranger Things" Season 2 is filled with retro movie references, including parallels to 'Stand by Me,' 'Aliens,' 'Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom,' 'Gremlins,' 'Star Wars,' and more. Here's our shot-for-shot comparison.

34.title: 9 Things to Know About 'Justice League'
34.plot: Gear up for 'Justice League' with some fast facts about the movie and characters, including which three cast members also appeared in "Game of Thrones."

35.title: 9 Simple Rules for a Great Thanksgiving
35.plot: Do you want to have the greatest Thanksgiving ever? We're here to help. Follow these nine simple rules inspired by some of our favorite scenes in TV and movies.

imdb.title: IMDb Originals
plot: _IMDb Originals_ (qv) informs, entertains, and engages fans of all ages with video content that covers movies, television, special events, awards shows, holidays, and more.
